message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a great product and I think you'd really appreciate it. I'm offering it to you for $200.  Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $180. Is that something you'd be willing to do?
Bob, I appreciate your interest!  I can come down a bit to $190, but that's my final offer.  Let me know if we can work with that.
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $170. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, and I'm willing to work with you.  I can do $185, but that's really as low as I can go. What do you say?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I was thinking more along the lines of $165. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Bob, I'm starting to think we might not be able to agree on a price.  I'm willing to do $175, but that's really my final offer. Let me know what you think.
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $160. Is that something you'd be willing to do?
Bob, I'm running out of time here. I'm going to have to go with my other buyer if we can't agree on a price.  My absolute final offer is $170.  Take it or leave it.
I'm willing to walk away if I don't get a good deal, so my final offer is $155. That's as low as I'm willing to go. If you can meet me at this price, I'll buy the product from you.
